auth.resetEmailSent: If an account exists, we sent a reset link to that email.

authLayout.tagline: Track income, expenses, and savings. Stay on top of your financial health.

dashboard.noExpenseData: No expense data for this month.

budgets.setMonthlyLimit: Set monthly limit for a category
budgets.noBudgets: No budgets set for this month.

profile.title: Profile
profile.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
profile.changePasswordError: Failed to change password. Check current password.
profile.noEmailPasswordProvider: You signed in with Google only. Set a password in profile to change it later.

income.title: Income
income.noIncome: No income recorded for this month.

reports.title: Reports
reports.incomeExpensesSavingsForMonth: Income, expenses, savings for selected month
reports.suggestion_record_income_accurate: Record your income to get an accurate health score.
reports.suggestion_no_income_track_source: If you have no income this month, track where the money is coming from.
reports.suggestion_record_income_expenses: Record your income and expenses for this month.
reports.suggestion_savings_20_rule: Try to save at least 20% of your income (50/30/20 rule).
reports.suggestion_increase_savings_10_20: Increase your savings rate. Aim for 10–20% of income.
reports.suggestion_start_saving: Start saving a portion of your income each month.
reports.suggestion_review_variable_70: Review variable expenses to keep spending under 70% of income.
reports.suggestion_expenses_very_high: Expenses are very high relative to income. Look for areas to cut.
reports.suggestion_expenses_exceed_income: Expenses exceed income. Reduce spending or increase income urgently.
reports.suggestion_overspending: You are overspending. Reduce expenses or increase income.
